# Invisibility (Ring)
## Overview
**Aura** faint illusion; **CL** 3rd

**Slot** ring

**Price** 20,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

By activating this simple silver ring, the wearer can benefit from *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]*, as the spell.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]*

**Cost** 10,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 481
